participant_2.background:

content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to weld and rock climb!
That's cool! I've never welded before. Do you have to be really strong to do it?
Not really, you just need to be able to control the machine and the welding rods.
That's good to know. I've always been curious about it. What's your favorite thing about rock climbing?
I love the feeling of being free and the challenge of it. It's also a great way to get some exercise.
I can see why you like it. It sounds like it's a lot of fun. I'm not much of an outdoors person, but I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to meet new people.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to work out, volunteer with dogs, and I'm a student.
That's cool! I've always wanted to volunteer with dogs. What kind of work do you do?
I work with a local animal shelter. I help walk dogs, clean kennels, and play with them.
That sounds like a great job! I'm sure the dogs love you.
They do! It's a lot of fun. I'm glad I get to do it.
It sounds like you have a lot of hobbies. Do you have any other interests?
I like to listen to jazz music and read books.
I love jazz music! I also like to read books. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I really like historical fiction and mysteries.
I like those too! I'm a big fan of Agatha Christie.
Me too! She's one of my favorite authors.
It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Me too
